title: Not Yet Investing Enough?
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Housing is typically the largest item in a household budget. Thus, if you can reduce that expense, you’ve got lots of room to boost your saving and investment. You can even enjoy luxury without incurring the costs of ownership and maintenance. The important thing is to remain within the bounds of what you can afford. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
